keyMoments.title: Dadan Family's First Appearance
keyMoments.description: The Dadan Family, a group of mountain bandits led by Curly Dadan, is introduced when Garp brings Luffy to their hideout on Mt. Colubo.
keyMoments.significance: Establishes the bandit family that served as the foster family for both Ace and Luffy during their childhood.

statusHistory.reason: Mountain bandit group operating on Mt. Colubo

description: A group of mountain bandits operating on Mt. Colubo on Dawn Island, led by Curly Dadan. Forced by Marine Vice Admiral Garp to raise both Portgas D. Ace and Monkey D. Luffy during their childhood.
